caption: A person entered the warehouse with a flashlight to search for something. A man and a woman ran to the deck, sharing a kiss. Two crew members noticed an object ahead and became extremely worried. The helmsman adjusted various instruments and controls as the cruise ship continued forward, swaying. Water flooded into the cabin, causing panic as it rose up to people's chests. People turned on the light and find that the bedrooms were also inundated with seawater, and it filled the entire corridor. Many people gathered on the deck. Some people were still in the inner cabin of the ship.
